item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
------------------------------

There are many things we should know when it comes to REAL ESTATE and TAXES.

In this webinar, expert and experienced tax consultant, Shahar Plinner, will address some of the most important aspects and the changes that are coming in 2013.

Topics that will cover:

  1. The requirements of having the properties under the LLC
  2. 1040 and Schedule E
  3. 1065 and Form 8825
  4. Section 179 for 2013
  5. Cost segregation â€“ definition changes end of the year
  6. Dividend income in 2013
  7. Long-term capital gains up to 20%
  8. 1099-C cancellation of debt exclusion expires end of the year (short sales, foreclosures)

This webinar is relevant for experienced and beginner real estate investors.

-------

RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
item.name: 8 Important Things You Should Know About Real Estate and Taxes in 2012
